description.english: Jump over the logs!
Don't help the farmers.
Speak with the farmer about the missing cow.
Try to get inside the farmer's basement.
Learn how to speak with animals, don't kill the farmers, talk with one of the cows, talk with Malan.
Learn how to speak with animals, talk with one of the chickens at the farm in Algaria.
If you kill the farmers, resurrect Malan then go to the garden near the farm and make him work.
Enter the chicken coop with all four animals that are shown inside.
Make Abriz to join your party and then go down in the Pita Mine, in the basement of the farmers.
Kill the beavers and use their bodies to make a bridge.
Help the beavers with wood.
Side with the order in the Cave of Echo.
Go to the N-W part of Lovendale.
Cut 100 trees then go to the first house in Lovendale. You can always illegally cut trees.
Learn Necromancy from Abriz, East of Lovendale or from the tome in the underground city.  (after 200 days in-game, the city appears)
Buy the Underwater Temple, go down the stairs, find the hole from which the tanukis come in, block it.
From your house, get the Stove upgrade.
From your house, get the Yard upgrade.
From your house, get the Potion-Maker upgrade.
From your house, get the Grinder upgrade, the upgrade not the app, I mean you can also get the app we don't judge.
Talk with the lady in Lovendale who wants you to rob a grave, resurrect the guy you steal from, talk with her until you can put her in jail.
Buy the restaurant in Shang.
Somewhere in the Algaria Forest.
Get the Yard upgrade and dig your well.
After you unlock the underground in Honshu, sacrifice a companion to fight Death itself.
After you unlock the underground in Honshu, revive the mummy and go back in Lovendale's Temple.
Wait 200 days and sleep in your house or learn the move  Earthquake and use it in Honshu Forest South.
Destroy the statue at the end of the Cave of Dusk.
Destroy the statue at the end of the Cave of Dzob.
Search for a grave in Algaria Forest after your grave-robbing skill is at least 10.
Go to Busulf Island from Mundo and buy the farm.
Learn Kin's story, then after you do the Shuu event in the Senjuan Crater, Kin can open a portal.
Go into the Manor and talk with the picture, sacrifice your eye for knowledge.
From your house, get the Bee upgrade.
Go to the underground after the earthquake event, look for a door in the western part.
Do the poacher's club quest, level your dragon to 99, fly to the Ashen Ruins, and let your cow bite the Moo Cult.
Gather all the Pleyad Weapons, Recruit Cradilla, Get the Skeleton Slime Sword and look for a light in the Algaria Northern Forest.
Go deep down in the Ashen Ruins and have a  faulty golem in your party when you enter the frozen temple.
Snake Oil Vendor, its location will depend based on the moon cycle.
Somewhere in a manor...
Somewhere in a library in Hator...
Somewhere in The Cave of Echo...
Somewhere in a Lodge...
Somewhere in Krawser...
Somewhere in Capitol...
Somewhere in Not-Atlantida...

displayName.english: I used this to get chicks

description.english: Go in Hator and talk with the cursed monkey.
Defeat the demon in the secret part of the forest.
Go to the Bar in Hator and buy the mine from the bartender.
After you buy Oblosia Mine, build the digger.
Get a Weird Mushroom from the Mushroom-Men, eat and watch the slime dream.
Get a Weird Mushroom from the Mushroom-Men, eat and watch the skeleton dream.
Get a Weird Mushroom from the Mushroom-Men, eat and watch the piano dream.
Kill the current king in Shang and become the new ruler.
Tell the king about the bad people who want to kill him.
Side against the order in the Cave of Echo.
Upgrade your castle's walls.
Upgrade your castle's floors.
As a king, declare war and conquer Lovendale.
As a king, declare war and conquer Hator.
You learned the mysteries of the manor.
As king, talk with your servant about upgrades.
As king, talk with your servant about upgrades.
As king, talk with your servant about upgrades.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
In Hestos, get out of Jail.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
In the castle's skill-tree, upgrade Guards I.
In the castle's skill-tree, upgrade Guards II.
In the castle's skill-tree, upgrade Guards III.
In the castle's skill-tree, upgrade Guards IV.
In the castle's skill-tree, upgrade Guards V.
In the castle's skill-tree, upgrade Guards VI.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
Learn how to speak with animals then go to the farmer that's in the Heaven's Tear North Forest.
As a king, declare war and conquer Zekra.
As a king, declare war and conquer Shuu.
As a king, get this upgrade from the skill-tree.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
As king, hold court by sitting on your throne.
In the castle's skill-tree, upgrade Flags.
As a king, declare war and conquer Krawser.
Upgrade your castle's walls and floors with gold.
In the castle's skill-tree, upgrade Treasury.
In the Treasury, gather dragon bones by holding court and getting the Treasure Maps 3, 4 and 5.
Talk with Gomigdal in the exam room after you take your adventurer license.
Touch a lotus in the Dead-Flake Cave.
If you didn't kill Abriz, go to her after you learned Water Bomb and Tornado and she will teach you this new skill.
Go to the magic college and earn four recommendations.
Go to the magic college and learn how to translate an ancient language.
Go to the magic college and learn how to translate an ancient language, finish "The old one" questline then come back to Sona.
Go to the magic college and start the "Prison" questline.
Found at the end of the Underwater Temple.
Found at the end of the Ikduman-Sil.
